title: INITIATION / SPEED HABIT
description: A thought for becoming a speed addict.

dialogueTree.title: Electrochemistry: "Now that you've acquired some stimu..."
dialogueTree.text: Now that you've acquired some stimulants, it's time for a little pick-me-up. Time to *detect*.

links.title: You: "Will it make me into a Supercop?"
links.text: Will it make me into a Supercop?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It will make you into *more* than t..."
links.text: It will make you into *more* than that -- a Megacop! This is your modus operandi. This is how you've done it for *years*. Let's go!

links.title: You: "What... but right *here*? Now?"
links.text: What... but right *here*? Now?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "See, that's your problem -- a lack..."
links.text: See, that's your problem -- a lack of confidence. Speed can help you with that. It can help you with EVERYTHING.

links.title: You: "This is gonna be really bad for my..."
links.text: This is gonna be really bad for my health, isn't it?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It's not ideal, no... But you need..."
links.text: It's not ideal, no... But you need the zeal. Let's face it, you're never going to finish this case without cheating.

links.title: You: "Okay, my body is ready. Let's do th..."
links.text: Okay, my body is ready. Let's do this. (Try some speed.)

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You raise the bottle, close a nostr..."
links.text: You raise the bottle, close a nostril and inhale *furiously*. The rush is almost immediate. It tastes bitter and caustic, and stings a bit inside your nose.

links.title: You: "Mamma mia!"
links.text: Mamma mia!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Now the taste is slowly receding in..."
links.text: Now the taste is slowly receding into your throat... The rush is growing in intensity, your little heart pounding like a bird in a cage. A sweat breaks out across your brow, your jaw clenches...

links.title: Endurance: "And, let's be honest, there's a lit..."
links.text: And, let's be honest, there's a little chest pain -- the *good* kind, of course. You may wanna blast a Nosaphed or something.

links.title: Logic: "Hmmm, you could work with this high..."
links.text: Hmmm, you could work with this high... Like, literally *work*: Solve the case, file some papers. Maybe clean up your hostel room, then solve *another* case, then start a side investigation into the para-natural, then build a radiocomputer...

links.title: Composure: "Whooh, this shit is strong. This sh..."
links.text: Whooh, this shit is strong. This shit is disco.

links.title: Suggestion: "Time for a little truth. Tell the l..."
links.text: Time for a little truth. Tell the lieutenant you did some, clear the air.

links.title: You: ""Kim, I did a little speed. I hope..."
links.text: "Kim, I did a little speed. I hope you don't mind. It was for professional reasons."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not your mother." He avoids yo..."
links.text: "I'm not your mother." He avoids your gaze. "I don't care. Do what you have to do."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "As long as you remain functional, h..."
links.text: As long as you remain functional, he thinks. Now let's get back to work.

links.title: You: "Feels great. Are there *any* downsi..."
links.text: Feels great. Are there *any* downsides to this at all?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "To *this*? You kidding?! There are..."
links.text: To *this*? You kidding?! There are downsides to *not* being on it.

links.title: Volition: "There are *massive* downsides. It's..."
links.text: There are *massive* downsides. It's a potent neurotoxin. You're turning yourself into a frayed idiot.

links.title: You: "Cool, cool, let's boogie. [Finish t..."
links.text: Cool, cool, let's boogie. [Finish thought and spring to action.]

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Spring-spring! Everything is clear..."
links.text: Spring-spring! Everything is clear around you. You're ready to concentrate on the next task in the task chain.

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "In the bottom right corner of the s..."
links.text: In the bottom right corner of the screen there's a SPEED button! SPEED gives +1 to MOTORIC skills: Perception, Reaction Speed, Hand/Eye Coordination, Savoir Faire, Interfacing, and Composure. This is good before a White Check -- but damages your Morale.

links.title: You: "Good to have you back, Officer Supe..."
links.text: Good to have you back, Officer Supercop. The world has been waiting.

links.title: You: ""Hngfff...""
links.text: "Hngfff..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You raise the Preptide bottle, pres..."
links.text: You raise the Preptide bottle, press one nostril closed, and inhale *furiously* with the other. The rush is almost immediate. It tastes bitter and caustic, and stings a bit inside your nose.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You raise the bottle, close a nostr..."
links.text: You raise the bottle, close a nostril and inhale *furiously*. The rush is almost immediate. It tastes bitter and caustic, and stings a bit inside your nose.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You raise the Preptide bottle, pres..."
links.text: You raise the Preptide bottle, press one nostril closed, and inhale *furiously* with the other. The rush is almost immediate. It tastes bitter and caustic, and stings a bit inside your nose.

links.title: You: "I'm not doing this now. [Ignore tho..."
links.text: I'm not doing this now. [Ignore thought.]

links.title: Electrochemistry: "This is so unprofessional of you. T..."
links.text: This is so unprofessional of you. Think you can ignore this -- your *moral compass* telling you to sniff it? Guess again -- you'll be back here soon. You'll get the chance to choose more wisely.

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "You've passed up your chance to sta..."
links.text: You've passed up your chance to start using SPEED for now, but don't worry! The option to use it becomes available again in 1 hour.
